channel.title: Join Logic Pk ! New amazing Pk server ! everything a normal Player wants!Try it!
channel.description:
Give this server a chance Try out ! New Sort of RSPS ! Check out the pictures, all bosses in wildy amazing Pk , Sick nice prices & high drop rates look down and Join us , friendly staff everything what a player wants is in this server !
Dear players , This is a new amazing server with the next features; Now we got Vps running so dont watch at Run Time ! server is online 99,9%
- The most beast Bosses are in wildy! - High Drop Rates! - Fast leveling + Double EXP weekend! -Donator Boss is dropping many items like Phats, korasi, claws, wheen masks , But harder to get - You can get fast rich by bossing! - We have Torva , Pernix , Vrtus , Full Vesta's, Statius and all the PVP armour available 100% + Void!! - New Magic spells, Armadyl Storm, Polypore and glacors for the drops!! - Pvp armour degrades -Great staff , really active owners fast answering and very friendly - All items works correctfull ! - And Much Much MORE!!! - And many more , . . . Check it self! This is a Non-Spawn Pk server ! with all that features above ! This server is ideally made for PKING, So come join now and start you're adventure today!
Credits Blitzz
This is our first video enjoy.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=81M8A1b7UIA
(New Website) www.logic-pk.tk
